content.text:
[@SoapDog](@gaQw6z30GpfsW9k8V5ED4pHrg8zmrqku24zTSAINhRg=.ed25519) 

- super excited to have an excuse to play around with scheme
- hella curious about what I might be able to do with this (!)
  - but having a hard time thinking things right now?
  - I wonder what the API is and which functions are available
  - which dialect of Scheme is this?!
- wondering how tightly coupled this is to patchfox -- does it work on the CLI too?
- mind-blown that you just casually added a Scheme interpreter to a Scuttlebutt client
